name: Mr. Mime
flavorText:
If interrupted
while it is
miming, it will slap around the
offender with its
broad hands.

previous.name: Starmie
previous.flavorText:
Its central core
glows with the
seven colors of the rainbow. Some
people value the
core as a gem.

next.name: Scyther
next.flavorText:
With ninja-like
agility and speed,
it can create the illusion that
there is more
than one.

pokemon.name: Mime Jr.
pokemon.flavorText:
It habitually mimics foes. Once
mimicked, the foe cannot take its
eyes off this Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Mr. Mime
pokemon.flavorText:
If interrupted
while it is
miming, it will slap around the
offender with its
broad hands.

pokemon.name: Mr. Rime
pokemon.flavorText:
It’s highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane
of ice in time with its graceful movements.
